selected_skills.name: extract_angle_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the angle ∠AMK from the provided diagram image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to analyze the diagram image and extract the angle ∠AMK.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a single line output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the extracted angle into the required output format.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_angle_in_square_with_inscribed_circle
new_skill_specs.purpose: To calculate the angle ∠AMK in a square with an inscribed circle using the positions of points A, M, and K.
edge_cases: Points A, M, and K are collinear.
